mapper.insert: insert into loan_product_bank (creator_id, create_time, editor_id, edit_time, status, flag, bank_id, product_id) values (#{creatorId}, #{createTime}, #{editorId}, #{editTime}, #{status}, #{flag}, #{bankId}, #{productId})
mapper.update: update loan_product_bank set editor_id = #{editorId}, edit_time = #{editTime}, bank_id = #{bankId}, product_id = #{productId} where id = #{id}
update loan_product_bank set status = false, flag = false where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from loan_product_bank where status = true and flag = true and id = #{id}
